hints.content:
Multiplication and division are related:

$\begin{align}
\greenD{\text{number of groups}} \times \maroonD{\text{size of groups}} = \purpleC{\text{total}} \\\\
\maroonD{\text{size of groups}} \times \greenD{\text{number of groups}} = \purpleC{\text{total}} \\\\
\\\\
\purpleC{\text{total}} \div \greenD{\text{number of groups}} =\maroonD{\text{size of groups}} \\\\
\purpleC{\text{total}} \div \maroonD{\text{size of groups}} =\greenD{\text{number of groups}}
\end{align}$

In this fact family, the $\purpleC{\text{total}}$ is $\purpleC{32}$.

The $\maroonD{\text{size of the groups}}$ is ${\maroonD{8}}$.

![Tape diagram showing 32 is equal to question mark equal groups of 8](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/f6464abf190cf056533c1135921d8aae4ae77651)

The $\greenD{\text{number of the groups}}$ is $\greenD{?}$.
The equation $\greenD{?} \times {\maroonD{8}} = \purpleC{32}$ can help us find the unknown number.

question.content:
**Create an equation to help us find the unknown number in $32 \div {?} = 8$ .**

${?}\times{}$[[☃ dropdown 4]] $=$ [[☃ dropdown 5]]
